result.purpose: Responsible for the configuration, routing, and dependency injection of the quest center application in the Ronin wallet services.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on separation of concerns with distinct files for configuration, routing, and dependency management.

cmd/quest_center/config.go.purpose: Configuration setup for the quest center application in the Ronin wallet services.

cmd/quest_center/main.go.purpose: Main entry point for the Ronin Wallet Quest API service.

cmd/quest_center/routes.go.purpose: Defines routing groups for user and private quest-related endpoints in a web service.

cmd/quest_center/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the quest center service in a web application.

cmd/quest_center/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the quest center service using Wire.
